items.title: CVS shares are up 45% this year — here's why it may be starting to turn its business around
items.content: Some analysts are more optimistic about CVS' ability to navigate higher-than-expected medical costs in its insurance unit moving forward.
items.contentSnippet: Some analysts are more optimistic about CVS' ability to navigate higher-than-expected medical costs in its insurance unit moving forward.

items.title: As Trump eyes more tariffs, South Korea remains safe haven for GM and Hyundai
items.content: Automakers such as Hyundai Motor and General Motors have increasingly used South Korea as a tariff-free export market to the U.S.
items.contentSnippet: Automakers such as Hyundai Motor and General Motors have increasingly used South Korea as a tariff-free export market to the U.S.

items.title: U.S. investors, Big Pharma race to find new medicines in China
items.content: U.S. investors and large pharmaceutical companies are increasingly doing deals in China as the country's biopharma sector transforms.
items.contentSnippet: U.S. investors and large pharmaceutical companies are increasingly doing deals in China as the country's biopharma sector transforms.

items.title: CFPB’s new leadership begins staff purge with dozens of employees terminated
items.content: The terminations have sowed more confusion at the bureau, as several of those being laid off had already accepted federal buyout offers, said one of the people.
items.contentSnippet: The terminations have sowed more confusion at the bureau, as several of those being laid off had already accepted federal buyout offers, said one of the people.

items.title: Comcast and NBCUniversal receive FCC inquiry on DEI initiatives
items.content: The Federal Communications Commission has sent a letter to Comcast inquiring about its DEI practices, a company spokesperson confirmed Wednesday.
items.contentSnippet: The Federal Communications Commission has sent a letter to Comcast inquiring about its DEI practices, a company spokesperson confirmed Wednesday.

items.title: CVS CEO defends pharmacy middlemen, accuses drugmakers of 'monopolistic' practices
items.content: CVS CEO David Joyner's comments come as lawmakers on both sides of the aisle and President Donald Trump have signaled interest in cracking down on PBMs.
items.contentSnippet: CVS CEO David Joyner's comments come as lawmakers on both sides of the aisle and President Donald Trump have signaled interest in cracking down on PBMs.

items.title: ESPN host Stephen A. Smith says he would be U.S. president as long as he doesn't have to campaign
items.content: ESPN personality Stephen A. Smith told CNBC Sport that he is not interested in campaigning but would be interested in being president.
items.contentSnippet: ESPN personality Stephen A. Smith told CNBC Sport that he is not interested in campaigning but would be interested in being president.

items.title: Bank of America CEO on inflation impact on U.S. economy: ‘Rates are going to stay where they are’

items.contentSnippet: The Bureau of Labor Statistics reported hotter-than-expected growth in the U.S. consumer price index, forcing markets to recalibrate rate expectations.

items.title: Prebiotic soda brand Olipop valued at $1.85 billion in latest funding round
items.content: Olipop's annual sales surpassed $400 million in 2024 as competition heats up with rivals such as Poppi.
items.contentSnippet: Olipop's annual sales surpassed $400 million in 2024 as competition heats up with rivals such as Poppi.

items.title: Zelle payments top $1 trillion in 2024 as network's growth outpaces rivals including PayPal
items.content: Zelle said its user base jumped 12% to 151 million accounts in 2024, and that the total dollars sent on the platform jumped 27% from the year earlier.
items.contentSnippet: Zelle said its user base jumped 12% to 151 million accounts in 2024, and that the total dollars sent on the platform jumped 27% from the year earlier.

items.title: CVS shares pop 15% on big earnings beat, even as high medical costs drag down insurance unit
items.content: It caps off the first full quarter with David Joyner, a longtime CVS executive, as CEO of the troubled retail drugstore chain.
items.contentSnippet: It caps off the first full quarter with David Joyner, a longtime CVS executive, as CEO of the troubled retail drugstore chain.

items.title: Biogen beats estimates on cost cuts and new drugs like Leqembi, but profit outlook falls short
items.content: Biogen expects Leqembi and new rare disease and depression treatments to help offset revenue lost from multiple sclerosis products.
items.contentSnippet: Biogen expects Leqembi and new rare disease and depression treatments to help offset revenue lost from multiple sclerosis products.

items.title: Tom Brady buys ownership stake in sports collectibles company
items.content: Tom Brady will acquire a 50% stake in CardVault, a sports card and memorabilia retailer, the company announced on Wednesday.
items.contentSnippet: Tom Brady will acquire a 50% stake in CardVault, a sports card and memorabilia retailer, the company announced on Wednesday.

items.title: Tequila, mezcal are the only spirits growing in sales, but tariffs would be 'catastrophic,' industry group says
items.content: U.S. spirits sales declined in 2024 despite maintaining its market share ahead of beer and wine. Tequila and Mezcal grew, but tariffs could change that.
items.contentSnippet: U.S. spirits sales declined in 2024 despite maintaining its market share ahead of beer and wine. Tequila and Mezcal grew, but tariffs could change that.

items.title: Super Bowl 59 attracts record 127.7 million viewers

items.title: Coca-Cola says it will sell more soda in plastic bottles if aluminum tariffs take effect

items.title: GM expects to mitigate up to 50% of potential North American tariffs, which Ford describes as 'chaos'
